text:
March 5, 1954
Memo:
So? Officers
Board of Directors
Executive Director
Associate Director
From? John Holt
Re: Adlai Stevenson and Harvard Godkin Lectures
Miss Fleming and Gentlemens
I believe the enclosed copies of correspondence between Ralph
J. Tangney* W3BH, and me are self-explanatory.
May I suggest that this matter might well be discussed at the
Columbus meeting?
Sincerely*,
JE:do
